title: Actor Zachary Horwitz Sentenced to 20 Years in Prison for $650 Million Ponzi Scheme
sub_head: Judge orders actor to pay more than $230.3 million in restitution to victims
body:
A Los Angeles actor who scammed investors in a $650 million Ponzi scheme was sentenced to 20 years in federal prison, the Justice Department said.
Zachary Joseph Horwitz, a 35-year old actor, bilked investors in a yearslong scheme in which he falsely claimed investor funding would be used to obtain distribution rights to films that would later be licensed to online streaming platforms like Netflix and HBO, according to authorities.
